pl.bristleback.server.bristle.serialization.jackson

Class JacksonSerializationEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.bristleback.server.bristle.serialization.jackson.JacksonSerializationEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.ConfigurationAware, pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.SerializationEngine<JacksonSerialization>

    @Component(value="system.serializer.jackson")
public class JacksonSerializationEngine
extends Object
implements pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.SerializationEngine<JacksonSerialization>
    This serialization engine uses Jackson processing library. ObjectMapper is used in serialization/deserialization operations. To customize object mapper, create bean implementing ObjectMapperFactory interface. This is a default SerializationEngine implementation used in Bristleback Framework.

    Name of this serialization engine: system.serializer.jackson

    Jackson serialization module relies on following Jackson dependencies: jackson-core, jackson-databind and jackson-annotations, all of them in version: 2.2.2. If you want to use other versions of Jackson, you can exclude those three dependencies from your project and place them by yourself in versions you desire.

    Created on: 2012-03-09 18:27:48

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec
